data.title: Music in the Park — Rockford Park District
data.meta_description: Music in the Park is an outdoor concert series held at the beautiful open-aired Sinnissippi Music Shell in Sinnissippi Park.
data.text:
MUSIC IN THE PARK

Music in the Park is an outdoor concert series held at the beautiful open-aired Sinnissippi Park Music Shell. Surrounded by majestic trees, local and regional talents work their musical magic during the summer months.

Music in the Park is in need of volunteers to serve in a variety of areas including: assisting Music Shell event staff in directing cars to parking areas, greeting patrons, selling raffle tickets, and providing basic customer service. Click here to apply for our volunteer opportunities.

Tickets

The majority of our Music in the Park performances are free, we do offer VIP tickets for select performance dates. We also feature prime concerts each year, that are $5 per person and help us continue to bring you this popular music series each year.

Prime Concert Tickets: $5

Kids 5 and under are free

Prime Concert Tickets with VIP: $25

VIP Tickets: $20

Seating

General admission tickets guarantee entry to the concert. Seating in the concert venue is first come, first served. Bench seating is available but limited, so we highly recommend bringing chairs and blankets. Leashed dogs are permitted.

Ticket Check-In & Entry

Please bring a copy of your ticket or be prepared to show on your mobile device. Entry to the venue begins at 6pm. There will be three primary check-in locations: two at the top of the hill, on either side of the concession stand and the other at the path that goes through the woods Additional tickets may also be purchased on-site while quantities last.

Cancellation Policy

⛈️ All efforts will be made to hold each concert at the Music Shell. If staff determine that the chance for heavy rain or severe weather is likely, the performance may start early, be delayed, or cancelled. If heavy rain or storms develop during a concert, or if there is a power outage, it may be necessary to cancel on site.

The decision on whether to cancel the concert will be made no later than 3:00 p.m.

⚠️ When the event is cancelled due to weather, updates are posted on the Sinnissippi Music Shell Rainout Line extension, Sinnissippi Music Shell Facebook Page, and the Rockford Park District Twitter feed.

Refund Policy

No refunds on general admission tickets, your ticket payment will be considered a donation. If a concert is cancelled due to inclement weather, you can contact Rockford Park District Customer Service via call / text to 815-987-8800 to receive a refund for VIP tickets.
